00034 void TCPIPOutputSpikeDriver::FlushBuffers() throw (EDLUTException){
00035         
00036         unsigned short size = (unsigned short)this->OutputBuffer.size();
00037         this->Socket->sendBuffer(&size,sizeof(unsigned short));
00038         if (size>0){
00039                 OutputSpike * Array = new OutputSpike [size];
00040                 
00041                 for (unsigned short int i=0; i<size; ++i){
00042                         Array[i] = this->OutputBuffer[i];       
00043                 }
00044                 
00045                 this->Socket->sendBuffer((char *) Array, sizeof(OutputSpike)*size);
00046                                         
00047                 delete [] Array;
00048                 
00049                 this->OutputBuffer.clear();
00050         }
00051 }
